Romanus Orjinta (12 Ọgọst 1981 - c. 31 Disemba 2014  ) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke gbara dịka onye defender
Na 2003, ọ bụ onyeisi ndị Enyimba International FC tupu ebufee ya na Lillestrøm SK

N'afọ 2007 site n'aka onye ọrụ Egypt Mohamed Mohsen, onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ gara abanye na ụlọ ọrụ Egypt aleZamk SC mana ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwụsịrị nkwekọrịta ya na ya mgbe ọ chọpụtara na onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ nwere AIDS
Na 26 August 2008 onye bụbu Nigerian International, Romanus Orjinta, kpọlitere ọrụ ya na Niger Tornadoes FC
N'abalị nke afọ 2014, a hụrụ Orjinta nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya
Àtụ:Nigeria Squad 2004 African Cup of Nations
